name: Inter-Dimensional Asteroid Harvester
description:
-=HTML5 VERSION =-

Warning: This version is somewhat to extremely laggy on weaker CPUs! If you are experiencing heavy lag in the HTML 5 version, please download the EXE version.


Be forewarned, this game is admittedly poorly tested. I was running up against the clock, and I've been a bit ill, so I ran out of time. The game should function alright and be beatable though, but there may be some wonky bugs. I especially apologize for the mineral border sticking glitch.

Controls:

Arrow Keys

Left: Rotate Left

Right: Rotate Right

Up: Forward Thrust

Down: Reverse Thrust

Z: Shoot

B: Fire your one and only bomb.

C: "Space Breaks" (They're canonically ai-assisted thrusters and retrothrusters to stop your momentum, but not enough time for the graphics there.)

Key rebindings are theoretically possible in the options, but are very poorly tested.

Same with gamepad support. I have no clue what the default bindings even are. You have been warned.

Goal: To collect as many credits as possible.

How to get credits:

Grab Minerals mined from Asteroids!

Defeat Pirates!

Clear Stages with time left to get a bonus payment!

Patch Notes

v0.0.4b

-Original. Please play this version, if you are planning on rating the game for fairness, as version C is post-release patch.

-Windows Only

Warnings: Crashes on using up/down on any menu

v0.0.4c

-=AVAILABLE ON ITCH.IO=-

-HTML5 Support

-Menu Crash Fix

-Various Crash Fixes

-Options text sync bug fixed

-Removed bullet hit audio when bullet hits nothing

v0.0.4d

-Sound options work correctly now

v0.0.4e2

HTML5 ONLY

Changed the asteroid collisions from Precise to Rectangular with rotation;

This will likely lower the accuracy of the hit detection, but should have the lag vastly improved.
